title: Houston’s Justin Verlander Struggles in the World Series. Again.
description: Houston’s ace is one of the greatest pitchers of his generation but his disappointing start in Game 1 raised his career E.R.A. in the World Series to 6.07.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:credit: Annie Mulligan for The New York Times
media:description: Justin Verlander was perfect for three innings but subsequently fell apart. He has yet to win a World Series game in his celebrated career.
